I rarely write reviews, but the veggie lasagna was to die for!  I would definitely come back here again just for that. My co-worker had the empanadas which were yummy and a bit lighter. His words about the tomato salsa were, "it's so fresh that I could drink it like a shake."  I'm eating the dulce de leche dessert that came with my meal as I write this review and it's also very good, not too sweet...just how I like it. So you order your food at the front and then they bring it to you when it's ready!  Definitely a hidden gem... All their food is made in their kitchen upstairs.  Will be back for the laid back atmosphere and delicious pasta!
